features: Durable performance: With a resistant stretch weave coated in a durable water-repellent finish(PFOA-free), this pant is designed to last
Contemporary comfort: The stretch weave, high waist and wide straight leg make this pant both modern and comfortable
Outdoor versatile: With strategic pockets, an adjustable integrated waistband and thicker weave, this pant adapts to any situation, whatever the season
Waist adjustment: Always a perfect fit with our infinitely adjustable waist adjustment. Can be adjusted individually to your waist size to discover pure freedom of movement
